sql.where:
BOARDNUM>0
AND BOARDTITLE
AND BOARDCINTENTS
AND BOARDWRITER
LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (BOARDNUM, BOARDWRITER,BOARDTITLE,BOARDCONTENTS,CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE,BOARDHIT,BOARDCATEGORY,REF,STEP,DEPTH ) VALUES ( #{boardNum}, #{boardWriter},#{boardTitle},#{boardContents},SYSDATE, SYSDATE,0,'Q', BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL,0,0 )
mapper.select: SELECT Q.*,QN.* FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN QNAFILES QN ON (Q.BOARDNUM=QN.BOARDNUM) WHERE Q.BOARDNUM=#{boardNum} AND Q.DEL=0
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET STEP=STEP+1 WHERE REF=#{ref} AND STEP >#{step}
UPDATE QNA SET BOARDTITLE =#{boardTitle}, BOARDCONTENTS=#{boardContents}, UPDATEDATE=SYSDATE WHERE BOARDNUM =#{boardNum}
mapper.delete: UPDATE QNA SET DEL=1 WHERE BOARDNUM=#{boardNum}
